title: Characterization of a typical urban soil in terms of natural radionuclide content. The case study of a university campus
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Serpil Aközcan Pehlivanoğlu, Simona Mancini, Selin Özden, Michele Guida, Mariarosaria Falanga
